page.title: 04Youth Organizations
page.content: FOOTBALL My hobby is football. I play for several teams including the Scout Team the school team and a team in the boys league. I play once every week in the boys league. Even sometimes twice. Neill Knox KARATE My hobby is kartae. I joined a club in Huntly and I am an orange belt. There is a training two nights a week and two hours non stop every night so it is tiring. Neil Paterson. SCOUTS The Rhynie Scouts starteed in October in October of '84. During this time we hope have been on camps and competitions. Our Scout leader is Mr. Hall who was in the Army. On some days we have parties or campfires. Stuart Hunter.
